description: Schema version tracking for BigQuery table definitions

cost_data_standard_1_3.json.description: FOCUS 1.3 standard cost data with org-specific extensions and 10-level hierarchy

cloud_gcp_billing_raw_daily.json.description: GCP cloud billing raw data with 10-level hierarchy

cloud_aws_billing_raw_daily.json.description: AWS cloud billing raw data with 10-level hierarchy

cloud_azure_billing_raw_daily.json.description: Azure cloud billing raw data with 10-level hierarchy

cloud_oci_billing_raw_daily.json.description: OCI cloud billing raw data with 10-level hierarchy

subscription_plans.json.description: SaaS subscription plans with version history and 10-level hierarchy
changes: Note: billing_amount field deprecated, use unit_price instead

subscription_plan_costs_daily.json.description: Daily amortized subscription costs with 10-level hierarchy

genai_payg_usage_raw.json.description: GenAI PAYG usage raw data from provider APIs

genai_costs_daily_unified.json.description: Unified daily GenAI costs (PAYG + commitment + infrastructure)

org_hierarchy.json.description: N-level organizational hierarchy for cost allocation
changes: Supports flexible N-level hierarchy (not limited to 3 or 10 levels)
